title: Lamp switch
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to make a lamp switch, the idea is that when the switch is on the lamp turns on and when the switch is off the lamp turns off.

Select **SimpleLamp** to generate a lamp on the screen.

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/SimpleLamp-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Press devices again, select **SimpleButton**

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/SimpleButton-Item.png)
to generate an on/off button.

Press on your smartphone **Add device via QR code**

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Add-device-via-qr-code.png)
and scan the QR code. Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/Logic.png) on the sidebar,

move the **if** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/if-component.png)
and the **comparison** ![comparison](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/comparison-component.png)
components to the workspace

Move the **button** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simple-lamp-switch/button.png)

and the **lamp**
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simple-lamp-switch/lamp.png)
components to the workspace.

Put the components of the previous steps as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simple-lamp-switch/blocks.png)

To be attentive when the button is pressed, we will use events, imagine that there is a person attentive to when you press the button that tells the program that you pressed the button to turn on or turn off the lamp.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Devices.png) on the sidebar.

Then, move to the workspace the
![event](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/event-component.png)
component and move the event component
![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simple-lamp-switch/event-SimpleButton.png)
and place it as shown in the picture

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simple-lamp-switch/event.png)
